text: @atrupar @RepGrothman People say there’s a curse going around, it’s like a horror film. If you say “Donald J. Trump” while looking into a mirror or looking at people you will start coughing, be short of breath, get a fever, and test positive for coronavirus. I don’t know, it’s just what people say.
